channel.title: Problems with scar
channel.description:
Well I tried to use an Auto WoodCutter and this is what it showed, please help.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\SRL/SRL/skill/woodcutting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
EDIT: And this is wen I alreaddy have the new SCAR Divi

item.title: Problems with scar
item.dc:creator: @v_a_l_e_r_i_y v a l e r i y
item.description:
@v_a_l_e_r_i_y wrote:

k leme install and check again…

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with scar
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

You just didnt install srl correctly. Read through a couple tuts and do EXACTLY what they say, then it should work. Or if your using scar 3.0 or higher, you can go to file and download srl and the includes right from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with scar
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

I don’t mean the contents of your post, I’m referring to the file names. The first few slashes are backward, then the next couple are forward.

Allow me to quote.

[quote=“v a l e r i y”]Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.0\includes\SRL/SRL/skill/woodcutting.scar does not exist.[/quote]

Read full topic
